START.name: Swamp
START.desc: You are in an unfamiliar area. Everything is damp and covered with strange growth. The trees are unlike any you've seen before.

LOC2.name: Strange Swamp
LOC2.desc: You are surrounded by a thick fog, you can barely see your hands.

LOC3.name: Strange Swamp
LOC3.desc: You are hearing strange noises they sound like voices but you feel as if they can't be human.

LOC4.name: Wooden Hut
LOC4.desc: You are now certain that you hear a voice. It sounds as if its speaking in riddles.

LOC5.name: Training
LOC5.desc: You have stumbled upon Jedi Master Yoda, you will now try and bring balance to the force.
